name: Jinx
description: Jinx is a manic and impulsive criminal from Zaun, known for her love of chaos and destruction. Formerly known as Powder, her transformation is central to the events of Arcane.
quote: Powder's gone, Vi. All that's left is Jinx.

name: Vi
description: Vi is a former Zaunite street child turned Piltover enforcer. Fiercely protective and hot-headed, she’s determined to bring justice to the city — even if it means fighting her sister, Jinx.
quote: You’ve got a good heart. Don’t ever lose it, no matter how the world tries to break you.

name: Jayce
description: Jayce is a brilliant inventor and a leader in Piltover. He helped pioneer Hextech and strives to protect his city, often torn between duty and morality.
quote: Innovation is the key to progress, but it must be handled with care.

name: Caitlyn
description: Caitlyn is an elite marksman and a determined investigator. With a sharp mind and unshakable sense of justice, she partners with Vi to root out corruption in Piltover.
quote: We stand together or not at all.

name: Silco
description: Silco is a ruthless Zaunite leader who seeks independence from Piltover. A manipulative strategist, he adopts Jinx as a daughter-like figure and fuels her descent into chaos.
quote: Power, real power, doesn't come to those who were born strongest, or fastest, or smartest. It comes to those who will do anything to achieve it.

name: Vander
description: Vander is a father figure to Vi and Jinx, striving to maintain peace between Zaun and Piltover. He once led a rebellion but chose diplomacy to protect the ones he loves.
quote: When people look up to you, you don’t get to be selfish.

name: Ekko
description: Ekko is a brilliant young inventor and leader of the Firelights. Using time-manipulating technology, he fights to protect Zaun from corruption and violence.
quote: The past haunts us all. But we can't let it define us.

name: Heimerdinger
description: Professor Heimerdinger is a wise Yordle and one of Piltover’s founding fathers. He values caution and experience, often clashing with Jayce over the dangers of unchecked innovation.
quote: Progress cannot be rushed. We must temper our ambitions.

name: Mel Medarda
description: Mel is a powerful Piltover councilor from a wealthy Noxian family. Strategic and ambitious, she forms a political and personal alliance with Jayce to shape Piltover’s future.
quote: The only way to defeat a superior enemy is to stop playing by the rules.

name: Singed
description: Singed is a brilliant yet amoral scientist who pushes the boundaries of alchemy. His experiments are key to many of Zaun’s darker developments, including Shimmer.
quote: One must die so another may live.

name: Sevika
description: Sevika is a fierce and loyal enforcer working under Silco. Equipped with a powerful Shimmer-enhanced arm, she’s a brutal combatant and enforcer of Zaunite power.
quote: Loyalty to the cause is what separates survivors from corpses.

name: Grayson
description: Grayson was a high-ranking Piltover enforcer who attempted to maintain peace through negotiation. Her murder sets off a chain of violent events in the story.
quote: Peace is built on trust. We can't afford to lose that.

name: Marcus
description: Marcus is an enforcer who rises to power through uneasy deals with Silco. His ambition and desire to protect his daughter lead him down a morally gray path.
quote: Everything I do, I do to protect her.

name: Ambessa Medarda
description: Ambessa is Mel's powerful mother and a ruthless Noxian general. She arrives in Piltover seeking strategic alliances, while pushing her daughter toward greater dominance.
quote: In Noxus, we forge our leaders in battle, not politics.

name: Mylo
description: Mylo was one of Vi and Powder’s close friends during childhood. Quick-witted and sarcastic, he often masked his fear with humor. He tragically dies in the explosion that separates the group.
quote: That’s why we always lose. Because you always think you’re better than everyone else!

name: Claggor
description: Claggor was a strong and kind member of Vi’s childhood crew, easily recognizable by his goggles. He dies alongside Mylo, marking a pivotal turning point in Jinx's story.
quote: We’ve got this. Stick together, like always.

name: Deckard
description: Deckard was a Zaunite who enhanced himself with Shimmer to become stronger. His transformation showcases the drug’s dangerous potential. He fights Vi in a brutal underground match.
quote: You wanna be strong? Then prove it!

name: Benzo
description: Benzo ran a pawn shop in Zaun and was a father figure to Ekko. He was killed during Silco’s rise to power, representing the loss of old Zaunite values.
quote: Some things are more important than money.

name: Huck
description: Huck is a small-time shop owner in the Lanes. Friendly and streetwise, he sometimes deals in black-market goods. He tries to stay neutral in Zaun’s power struggles.
quote: Keep your head down, your mouth shut, and you’ll be fine.

name: Finn
description: Finn is a younger crime boss who attempts to challenge Silco's dominance. His arrogance leads to a fatal miscalculation when he underestimates Jinx’s loyalty to Silco.
quote: There’s a new order coming to Zaun, and I intend to be at the top.

name: Hoskel
description: Hoskel is a portly and conservative councilor of Piltover, known for his cautious and bureaucratic approach to governance.
quote: We mustn’t act in haste. Think of the implications.

name: Shoola
description: Shoola is an elegant and poised member of the Piltover Council, often seen weighing complex political decisions with calm demeanor.
quote: Grace under pressure is the true mark of a leader.

name: Bolbok
description: Bolbok is a large, bearded member of the Piltover Council. He tends to be analytical and measured in council matters.
quote: Let’s not forget the lessons of the past while rushing to the future.

name: Salo
description: Salo is one of the younger council members and is more progressive, often favoring innovation and advancement.
quote: If we don’t move forward, we fall behind.

name: Cassandra Kiramman
description: Cassandra Kiramman is a high-ranking Piltover noble and Caitlyn’s mother. She holds a seat on the council and prioritizes order and family reputation.
quote: The Kiramman name stands for dignity. Don’t forget that.

name: Sky
description: Sky is a kind-hearted and intelligent assistant working with Viktor. She admires his brilliance and supports his Hextech research.
quote: You’re changing the world, Viktor. Don’t lose yourself in the process.

name: Loris
description: Loris is a new Piltover Enforcer who joins Caitlyn’s elite squad. He is dependable, disciplined, and believes in justice and order.
quote: Justice is earned, not claimed.

name: Maddie Nolen
description: Maddie Nolen is a bright and determined officer secretly working for Ambessa Medarda. She’s embedded in Caitlyn’s squad and shows tactical skill.
quote: No one suspects a loyal soldier — that’s the beauty of it.

name: Isha
description: Isha is a traumatized child from Zaun who finds a home under Jinx’s protection. She reflects the innocence Powder once had.
quote: Are you... gonna blow something up again?

name: Gert
description: Gert is one of the founding members of the Jinxers gang in Zaun, loyal to Jinx and known for his wild energy and chaos.
quote: Wherever Jinx goes, the fun follows!

name: LeBlanc
description: LeBlanc is the enigmatic leader of the secretive Black Rose cabal. She manipulates events from the shadows using illusions and ancient magic.
quote: Truth is just another illusion — if you know how to weave it.

name: Rictus
description: Rictus is Ambessa Medarda’s mute and terrifying bodyguard. He enforces her will with silent precision and brute strength.
quote: *silent glare*

name: Felicia
description: Felicia is the long-lost mother of Vi and Powder (Jinx). Seen in flashbacks, she was part of Zaun’s early revolutionary movement.
quote: We fight not for power, but for a future our children can survive in.

name: Kino Medarda
description: Kino Medarda was Mel’s older brother who died in a Noxian war. His memory haunts the Medarda family and influences Mel’s decisions.
quote: We die with honor, so others may live free.

name: Warwick
description: Once known as Vander, Warwick is now a monstrous Shimmer-fueled beast created by Singed. He stalks the undercity, haunted by memories of who he once was.
quote: Pain... fear... betrayal... I remember it all.
